message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about natural language applications and text classification, which are typically covered in the arXiv CS sub-categories of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Information Retrieval (cs.IR), and Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE). Given the focus on text representation and classification, cs.CL and cs.LG are the most likely sub-categories, followed by cs.AI and cs.IR. cs.NE is also a possibility given the use of neural networks in the paper.
